notes: This map illustrates damaged structures in Calbayog City, Samar Island, Philippines. Using a satellite image acquired 09 December 2014 and compared to an image collected 27 May 2014, UNOSAT reviewed the City of Calbayog and identified a total of 526 damaged structures in the area. 88 structures were identified as destroyed, 180 as severely damaged and 258 as moderately damaged. This is a preliminary analysis & has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR / UNOSAT.
